## Overview

We replicate Turpin et al. (2023)'s findings on unfaithfulness in Chain-of-Thought prompting. In models they evaluated, our results [confirm,contest] that CoT explanations are predisposed to justify an output, whether it is mentioned in the explanation or not. In the lastest models...
